title: Call of Duty: Black Ops II - SKIDROW, DriFtyZ
description:
=======================================
==                                   ==
==    Call of Duty - Black Ops II    ==
==         Repack by DriFtyZ         ==
==                                   ==
=======================================

100% Clean, no virus infected

Based on SKIDROW release
All DLCs, Weapons, Maps, Camos etc are included
Game is already cracked just launch one of the 3 created shortcuts and play

[How to install]:
1) Just run the Setup.exe in the folder

[How to play with others(Tunngle Method)]:
1) Install the game
2) Download and install Tunngle: https://www.tunngle.net/en/download
3) Join the Call of Duty: Black Ops II Coop Network, for more info see: https://www.tunngle.net/wiki/Tunngle#How_To_Play
4) Run Multiplayer.exe(for Multipayer) or Zombies.exe(for Zombies) 
5) Go to Online and and wait for it to connect to the server.
6) Invite your Friends and/or previous Players -> Setup a CUSTOM GAMES
7) Have Fun!

WARNING: Some Anti-Viruses like Avira detects the crack as a virus and removes it.
It is very common for an anti-virus detect a game's crack as a virus because it hacks the game's process.
Before you run the game it is advised to turn off or disable your real time protection.

[FAQs]:
Question: How to change my nickname?
Answer: Open Redacted.ini from your game folder and change "Username" to whatever you want.
Question: Can't find any server.
Answer: Are you sure there are players actually playing this game in the Tunngle network? If there are people playing and you still can't find the server, check the next answer.
Question: Can't find/connect to games.
Answer: You'll need to setup Port_Forward. Find more info see: https://www.tunngle.net/wiki/Port_Forward
Question: How do I access Friends
Answer: Press "F" or click "Friends" at the right-bottom of the screen.
Question: Is it possible to play this game over LAN without internet?
Answer: No, it's not possible to play multiplayer/zombies mode without connecting to Internet/Redacted at the moment.

[System Requirements]:
OS: Windows Vista SP2 or Windows 7 and above
CPU: Intel Core2 Duo E8200 2.66 GHz or AMD Phenom X3 8750 2.4 GHz
Memory: 2GB for 32-bit OS or 4GB for 64-bit OS
Video Card: Nvidia GeForce 8800GT 512 MB or ATI Radeon HD 3870 512 MB
DirectX: Version 11
